name: Go Away , These are my games
name_original: Go Away , These are my games
description:
A series of three mini-games created for a Game Art class at the University of Oregon. With it being a summer class we had a very limited amount of time to create our work, I had no previous experience with Unity and was pretty happy to be able to throw together some basic games in the time I had.

If somehow you manage to find my page, and play this, let me know if you run into any issues.
